filecoin_growth_impact: As the distribution tool for FIL-RPGF, Drips has enabled the RetroPGF program to easily **distribute over 200.000 FIL to impactful projects**, and will distribute over 500.000 additional FIL this year.
description:
ðŸ’§ **Drips** is the super-app for funding Open Source. It enables organizations to flexibly fund any open-source repository on GitHub with any ERC-20 token, as One-Time Donations, or continuous streams. Using **Drip Lists**, many repositories and addresses can be funded all at once.

When a repository claims funding, it can **forward a percentage of funds to its dependencies**, creating a **global, fundable dependency graph**.

Drips has been deployed on Filecoin since late 2023, when it was first used to **[distribute rewards for FIL-RetroPGF-2](https://filecoin.drips.network/app/drip-lists/45193817480599985262554974973835763972521255481357121508020698376704)**. This year, we're providing the entire end-to-end tooling for the round with our new **[RetroPGF feature](https://www.drips.network/solutions/retro-pgf)** (which you're using right now!)
end_user:
The **organizers of FIL-RetroPGF** benefit from Drips' end-to-end functionality for managing RetroPGF rounds, allowing them to take in and manage applications, track applicant KYC status, collect votes, calculate results, and eventually distribute rewards straight to GitHub repositories with [amplified impact](https://www.drips.network/blog/posts/amplifying-the-impact-of-funding).

Additionally, of course **open-source developers** benefit from Drips by means of getting funded through the Drips Protocol.

We've onboarded major open-source projects from outside the Web3 space, such as [`svelte`](https://www.drips.network/app/projects/github/sveltejs/svelte?exact), [`rollup`](https://www.drips.network/app/projects/github/rollup/rollup?exact), [`websockets`](https://www.drips.network/app/projects/github/websockets/ws?exact), [`ffmpeg`](https://www.drips.network/app/projects/github/FFmpeg/FFmpeg?exact), and more.
testimonials: We've received several shoutouts and frequently receive feedback from Juan Benet and the FIL-RetroPGF-WG.
wallet_interactions_increase:
There are **over 4200 transactions on Filecoin** during the impact period (Nov 2024 - Sep 2025) on the Drips Protocol contracts alone:

- [Drips Core Contract](https://filecoin.blockscout.com/address/0xd320F59F109c618b19707ea5C5F068020eA333B3)
- [Drips Multicall](https://filecoin.blockscout.com/address/0xd6Ab8e72dE3742d45AdF108fAa112Cd232718828)
- [Drips RepoDriver Contract](https://filecoin.blockscout.com/address/0xe75f56B26857cAe06b455Bfc9481593Ae0FB4257)
- [Drips AddressDriver Contract](https://filecoin.blockscout.com/address/0x04693D13826a37dDdF973Be4275546Ad978cb9EE)

In addition to this, Drips also generates interactions with ERC-20 contracts and Ethereum Attestation Service (EAS).
